name: Leave Application
query:
SELECT
 name as "Leave Application:Link/Leave Application:200",
 employee as "Employee Name:Link/Employee:200",
 leave_type as "Leave Data:150",
 from_date as "From Date:Date:150",
 to_date as "To Date:Date:150",
total_leave_days as "Total Days:Data:90"
FROM
 `tabLeave Application`
